name: Cleave
effect: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and an enemy adjacent to you takes damage equal to your Strength modifier.
description: You hit one enemy, then cleave into another

name: Reaping Strike
effect: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage. Miss: Half Strength modifier damage. If you’re wielding a two-handed weapon, you deal damage equal to your Strength modifier
description: You punctuate your scything attacks with wicked jabs and small cutting blows that slip through your enemy’s defenses.

name: Tide of Iron
effect: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square if it is your size, smaller than you, or one size category larger. You can shift into the space that the target occupied.
description: After each mighty swing, you bring your shield to bear and use it to push your enemy back

name: Covering Attack
effect: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and an ally adjacent to the target can shift 2 squares.
description: You launch a dizzying barrage of thrusts at your enemy, compelling him to give you all his attention. Under the cover of your ferocious attack, one of your allies can safely retreat from that same foe.

name: Passing Attack
effect: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can shift 1 square. Make a secondary attack. Secondary Target: One creature other than the primary target Secondary Attack: Strength + 2 vs. AC Hit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
description: You land a ringing blow against your foe, inspiring a nearby ally to stike a blow of his own.

name: Spinning Sweep
effect: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.
description: You spin beneath your enemy’s guard with a long, powerful cut, and then sweep your leg through his an instant later to knock him head over heels

name: Steel Serpent Strike
effect: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is slowed and cannot shift until end of your next turn.
description: You stab viciously at your foe’s knee or foot to slow him down. No matter how tough he is, he’s going to favor that leg for a time.

name: Brute Strike
description: You shatter armor and bone with a ringing blow.

name: Comeback Strike
effect: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can spend a healing surge.
description: A timely strike against a hated foe invigorates you, giving you the strength and resolve to fight on.

name: Villain’s Menace
effect: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and a +4 power bonus to damage rolls against the target until the end of the encounter. Miss: Gain a +1 power bonus to attack rolls and a +2 power bonus to damage rolls against the target until the end of the encounter.
description: You strike your enemy hard and hound him with skilled parries and stern reprisals
